title: Romantic Wine-Lovers' Retreat near Queenstown with Signature Breakfast & Wine Tastings
description:
Soak up Central Otago's impressive natural scenery and discover the country’s wines with a stay at the beautiful Gibbston Valley Lodge & Spa, a boutique property set amid lush vines just 25 minutes from Queenstown, close to Wanaka and Arrowtown. An adults-only private haven of 24 architecturally designed lodges, Gibbston Valley Lodge & Spa is ideally located for leaving the hustle and bustle behind as you embrace the serenity of this picturesque part of the world.

Enjoy outstanding service and superb elegance as days are spent exploring the lush grounds and vines, tasting gourmet food and fine wines or simply relaxing on your secluded courtyard overlooking the historic vineyards. This wine-and-nature-lovers’ retreat also features a 24-hour gym, sauna and hot pool access, valet parking, private vehicle service (available for a surcharge), and so much more.

title: Award-Winning Wine-Lovers' Romantic Retreat near Queenstown with Daily Breakfast, Wine Tasting & NZ$50 Dining Credit
description:
Soak up Central Otago's spectacular natural scenery and discover local wines with a stay at this acclaimed vineyard retreat, set amid lush vines and rolling hinterland just 25 minutes from Queenstown. A private haven of 24 architecturally designed villas, Gibbston Valley Lodge and Spa offers your perfect chance to savour New Zealand's natural majesty to the last drop.

Outstanding service and superb elegance await as days are spent exploring the lush grounds, sampling gourmet food and fine wine at The Lodge or relaxing in your secluded courtyard overlooking the historic vineyards.

This wine-and-nature-lovers’ retreat also features a 24-hour gym, sauna and heated pool access, valet parking and a wonderful luxe spa - crowned 'New Zealand's Best Resort Spa' in the 2023 World Spa Awards.

title: Grand Opening: Boutique Wine-Lovers' Retreat with Sparkling Breakfast
description:
Soak up New Zealand’s impressive natural scenery and discover the country’s wines and sublime local produce with a boutique stay at Gibbston Valley Lodge & Spa, a brand-new property set amid lush vines just 25 minutes from Queenstown and brought to you by one of the founding wineries of Central Otago. This wine-and-nature-lovers’ escape comes with lavish inclusions such as daily signature breakfast with sparkling wine, a welcome drink on arrival, pre-dinner wine tasting and access to Bubbles Bar with sparkling wine available every day until 4pm. 

Embark on an exclusive Essential Winery Experience during your stay - offering a unique insight into the wine making world with a tour of the Gibbston's cellar and of the historic Home Block - the winery's first commercial vineyard planted in 1983, a visit to the winery’s famous Wine Cave and a wine tasting of some of Gibbston Valley’s most loved wines.

A private haven of 24 architecturally designed lodges, Gibbston Valley Lodge and Spa is ideally located for leaving the hustle and bustle behind as you embrace the serenity of this picturesque part of the world.

Enjoy outstanding service and superb elegance as days are spent exploring the lush grounds and vines, tasting gourmet food and fine wines or simply relaxing on your secluded courtyard overlooking the historic vineyards. This wine-and-nature-lovers’ retreat also features a 24-hour gym, sauna and hot pool access, valet parking, private vehicle service (available for a surcharge), a luxurious spa - recently awarded 'New Zealand's Best Resort Spa 2021' at the World Spa Awards - and so much more.

title: Wine-Lovers' Villa Retreat near Queenstown with Sparkling Breakfast
description:
Soak up Central Otago's impressive natural scenery and discover the country’s wines with a stay at the newly opened Gibbston Valley Lodge & Spa, a boutique property set amid lush vines just 25 minutes from Queenstown, and close to Wanaka and Arrowtown. This wine-and-nature-lovers’ escape comes with lavish inclusions such as daily signature breakfast with sparkling wine, a welcome drink on arrival, nightly pre-dinner wine tasting and complimentary Wi-Fi, bike hire and valet parking during your stay. 

You'll also embark on a Winery Experience on the estate - gaining a unique insight into the winemaking world with a tour of the property.
